en.To move: Press direction keys to move the cyan blocks around
en.To win: Fill all green symbols with the block shown
en.What to do now: Just move along the walls to the destination

zh_cn.\u79fb\u52a8: 按方向键来把青色方块四处移动
zh_cn.\u8d62: 把所有绿色符号填上它显示的方块
zh_cn.\u73b0\u5728\u8981\u505a\u7684: 只要沿着墙移动 到达终点
